Html:
Hi!

¿Can I use 'goal seek' Excel tool in PHPExcel? I mean write some values into specific cells and after that apply the 'goal seek' method to find different cells values.

Thanks a lot!

No, Goal Seek is not available within PHPExcel

While PHPExcel provides "native versions" for most of the analytical functions that can be used within Excel formulae in cells, it does not provide the higher-end tools that aren't included within the Excel workbook itself, but only within the Excel software.
